author: Special Correspondent
text: Neurosurgeon K.P. Thirumaran (45) died while he was treating patients at his clinic on T.P. Road in T.Nagar on Sunday afternoon. Police said Dr. Thirumaran fell unconscious while and was rushed to a private hospital where he was declared brought dead. A case has been registered under Section 174 of the Code of Criminal Procedure (death under mysterious and unnatural circumstances). —staff reporter
title: Doctor dies
